subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Fans may hear Ben Roethlisberger and “redemption” in the same sentence now that the Steelers are in the Super Bowl, as if athletic success can magically paper over all manner of sin.
snippet: Fans may hear Ben Roethlisberger and “redemption” in the same sentence now that the Steelers are in the Super Bowl, as if athletic success can magically paper over all manner of sin.
